DOC.brief_summary: The objective cross-over study validate Preference Module EARNS-Q adult subject ( > =18 year age ) Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis ( SAR ) take beclomethasone dipropionate beclomethasone dipropionate flunisolide .
DOC.brief_title: Validation Of Preference Module Of Experience With Allergic Rhinitis Nasal Sprays Questionnaire ( EARNS-Q )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Seasonal allergic rhinitis . Nasal allergy symptom spring allergy season . Prior use beclomethasone dipropionate flunisolide . Significant concomitant medical condition . Use corticosteroid . Use allergy identify medication study . Current tobacco use tobacco use within past year .
